@littlebigcrate @KiwiSlytherin @TheSpinoffTV @DearMama_ and a new episode coming out soon!
@LeilaniTamu @NicolaYoung15 @Kaitiakituturu I'm actually just finishing a short memoir about all this which should be out later this year.
@LeilaniTamu @NicolaYoung15 @Kaitiakituturu I wish you love and luck. It won't be easy and it is not fair you have to make these "choices".
@LeilaniTamu @NicolaYoung15 @Kaitiakituturu to answer your question, no, I don't think they have been picked up anywhere.
@LeilaniTamu @NicolaYoung15 @Kaitiakituturu oh so many feels! All the choices are basically unacceptable. It is so, so hard.
Is Eddie Redmayne's erumpent mating dance in Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them the sexiest thing ever?
@A_Ecclestone The Hedgehog, on the other hand, looks excellent.
@A_Ecclestone don't actually - it's pretty dire. But it was very meaningful to 12 year old Holly.
Watching "Now and Then", a forgotten masterpiece.
@SarahELaing I loved M&M SO much. Just finished it at Day's Bay, where I am trying to finish my first book. It was perfect. Thank you!
That was big and loud #eqnz
Day one of playing at being a full time writer. It is hard, dudes.
@LachlanForsyth @Mashedradar oh yes we know Ben and Holly. I am #teamnannyplum
Obsessively internet stalking Peppa Pig voice actors. #holiday
@greeniecaitlin of course! Cook was temped too but the sun wasn't over the yardarm yet. Not that we'll see the sun at all today!
Three trifles in the fridge. Bought all the ingredients pre-made but whatever. Domestic goddess right here.
@TrevorMallard nice one. I'm thinking maybe the full Richard Curtis canon these holidays.
I watched Love Actually with a big Baileys in hand, so it must be Christmas.
@stueethedog its a vicious cycle - they're up late, so they need more naps the next day, so they're up late again.
Last day at work, lots to do, kid was up till 10.45pm last night. What is this madness. Bring on the holidays.
And to my #nzsecretsanta, sorry about my crap emoji clues. I always feel weird asking for presents. You did a valiant job with little help!
Oh my god, my #nzsecretsanta has absolutely outdone themself, I'm blown away! That's four tickets. Four!!! Thank yo… https://t.co/SahNsZmz9Y

@sacraparental will post in the group!
@thelaurengraham just wanted to say THANK YOU for the kitchen timer writing method (and by extension Don). Life-changing!

@katetempest listening to Let Them Eat Chaos. Thank you. Wake up and love more - yes. More empathy, more hope, more humility, more love.
Put newsfeed eradicator on my browser and deleted the facebook app from my phone. Anxiety levels low and dropping.
That was a great weekend in Stars Hollow.
@Tea_plus_orange you're right though, it is a perfect image! It's from This is London off Warm Hand.
@Tea_plus_orange just got through putting three year old to bed. More like a thrashing whale. 🐳
@Tea_plus_orange oh bless you but I absolutely cannot claim credit. I was quoting another Don McGlashan song.
@DearMama_ @littlebigcrate sounds perfect!
@SteveBraunias thanks Steve. Sorry we don't get to meet this time. Hope it's a great night of good people.
@SteveBraunias sorry Steve I'm not going to make it - kid showing cracks after long night/day, plus I'm scared of getting stuck!
@greencatherine thanks Catherine. Esther would have slept through but we evacuated to be safe. Shattered but safe today xx
I know twitter can be kind of toxic but at times like this I'm so so grateful for it, both for info and community #eqnz #thanks
@SteveBraunias @nzherald sounds grand, hope I can.
I ordered some Bon tampons after your last #otrpod @alexkc and they arrived on earthquake morning #aboveandbeyond
@SteveBraunias @nzherald glad to hear it! Is your launch still on Steve?
I love this 💜 https://t.co/eAp9f4O8tj
Remarkably, this is the sum total of #eqnz damage at our place: a smashed kina. Feeling very fortunate. https://t.co/6D7bgN96D2
Given up on sleep. Esther, having woken our hosts' daughter, is now having her first barbie experience on their kitchen floor #eqnz #surreal
@rossbrowne thanks for that!
@rossbrowne yes we just left. Heading to friends in Maungaraki
@stueethedog me too! Sounds like parts were falling off but can't see any damage.
@stueethedog yeah it felt crazy. Like the ground was liquid. Ugh.
@_jjw_ I like that when faced with imminent death and destruction your first thought is "I must have coffee with Holly." And yes.
@Tarcia99 hope so! xx
@Tarcia99 have you heard from chch family?
@Tarcia99 you too. Ughhhh aftershocks :( :( 💜
@Tarcia99 grabbed Esther out of bed, carried her across the rolling floor, lights swinging like poi. Shit.
@Tarcia99 oh my god me too. Heard a huge crash and thought the back half of the house had fallen off.
34 years in NZ and I've never really been scared in an earthquake but that was fucking terrifying #eqnz
@SirWB me too! Sorry about that!
